comment._content: Seriously doubt it.....This gent has a small ear "lobe", Davis does NOT; Davis had more prominent cheek bones; Davis' nose was straighter; Davis has chin whiskers

comment.author: 9741459@N07
comment._content: How did Matthew Brady gain access to CS President Davis in 1863?  This is an imposter, set up for some long-forgotten reason, most likely.
